title: Nvidia Corporation earnings beat not sufficient to boost stock – Is it a good buy?
text: Nvidia Corporation's (NASDAQ:NVDA) strong fourth-quarter results were insufficient to inspire a bullish run as the stock fell 3.25% in Thursday premarket. Nvidia had posted a revenue of $7.64 billion, compared to an expected $7.42 billion, representing a growth of 53% from the prior year.

title: The Best undervalued growth stocks in tech that you should be watching right now
text: As fears of Fed tightening grip the market, we have seen a sharp sell-off in tech stocks over the last few weeks. The tech-heavy NASDAQ index has seen a drop of nearly 10% Year to Date, and most of those losses came at the start of 2022.

title: Nvidia (NVDA) Stock: Why It Is Trending Today
text: The stock price of NVIDIA (NASDAQ: NVDA) fell by over 7.5% today. This is why it happened.

title: Why Nvidia Bulls Laud The Stock As 'Tough Not To Own' After Q4 Print
text: NVIDIA Corporation (NASDAQ: NVDA) reported forecast-beating fourth-quarter results and issued upbeat guidance for the first quarter. Notwithstanding the better-than-expected earnings report, the stock is pulling back sharply on Thursday.

title: Nvidia Can't Catch a Break. Why Its Stock Is Still a Buy.
text: The chip maker delivered what Wall Street was expecting, and more, when it reported fourth-quarter earnings late Wednesday, and yet the stock is falling.

title: Nvidia: Why Broad-Based Demand Will Reverse The Post-Earnings Slump
text: Nvidia has extended steep declines despite reporting blockbuster fourth quarter earnings and a stronger-than-expected growth forecast for the current period on Wednesday evening. Investors were likely taken back by the slight weak spot in Nvidia's adjusted gross margin for Q4, which came in at 67%, falling short of consensus estimates of 67.1%.

title: Investing Club: Cramer calls Nvidia CEO the GOAT, says buy shares on a dip
text: "I would buy that right now," CNBC's Jim Cramer said of Nvidia's stock, urging Club members to get in before the company's big show and tell next month.

title: NVIDIA (NVDA) Q4 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Surge Y/Y
text: NVIDIA's (NVDA) fourth-quarter fiscal 2022 results reflect benefits of higher demand for chips used in data centers and gaming consoles amid the work-and-learn-at-home and gaming waves.

title: Deep Dive: Only two stocks in the benchmark semiconductor index beat Nvidia when ranked by these three measures
text: After the stock market closed Feb. 16, Nvidia Corp. reported a blowout quarter, which included sales rising 53% to a record high from a year earlier. The company's outlook for the next quarter also came in higher than analysts had expected.

title: The Ratings Game: As Nvidia stock drops after record-breaking earnings, analyst wonders ‘What more can you ask for?'
text: Nvidia Corp. shares fell Thursday even as analysts praised the chip maker's stellar results for the holiday quarter and widely expect the company's data-center business to surpass gaming in sales.

title: Buy The Dip In NVIDIA, Before It's Too Late
text: NVIDIA (NASDAQ: NVDA) shares moved lower in the wake of the company's very strong Q4 results because concern over margins emerged that we think is entirely overblown. The company expanded margin and produced record-setting results for Q4 and FY2021 and is guiding those margins to be flat on a YOY.

title: Nvidia ETFs to Tap on Upbeat Q4 Earnings

title: What's Going On With Nvidia Shares Today?
text: NVIDIA Corporation (NASDAQ:NVDA) shares are trading lower by 6.8% at $247.05 Thursday morning after the company reported fourth-quarter earnings results. Nvidia reported quarterly earnings of $1.32 per share which beat the analyst consensus estimate of $1.22.
